items.title: Vintage Leica M3 Camera
items.description: A classic vintage Leica M3 camera in excellent working condition, ideal for photography enthusiasts and collectors.

items.description: An iconic Mid-Century Modern Eames Lounge Chair, known for its ergonomic design and luxurious leather upholstery, perfect for any stylish home or office.
